meanings.definition: A large, powerful bank that operates on a global scale.
meanings.sent1: The superbanks control vast amounts of money worldwide.
meanings.sent2: Investors trust superbanks with their savings due to their stability.
meanings.sent3: Why did the superbanks hire a comedian? To add some humor to their financial reports!
meanings.sent4: The superbanks stand like giants in the financial landscape, casting shadows over smaller institutions.
meanings.sent5: The superbanks are like financial titans, ruling over the banking industry with their immense power.

meanings.definition: The highest level of banks in terms of size and influence.
meanings.sent1: Customers flock to the superbanks for their top-notch services.
meanings.sent2: The superbanks set the standards for excellence in the banking sector.
meanings.sent3: Why did the superbanks throw a party? To celebrate their towering success!
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, the superbanks reign supreme, towering over their competitors.
meanings.sent5: The superbanks are like the kings of the banking world, commanding respect and admiration from all.
